evidence.claim: National Healthcare Ed utilizes FHIR standards for data exchange in healthcare applications.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations regarding data handling.
References to using HL7 standards in their health tech integrations can be found on their developer pages.
X12 transaction sets are mentioned in the context of their EDI capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use; focus seems more on education.
